infotext.entitydescription.progenoids: The device used by the Astartes to ensure that the modification operation works properly can be removed at any time and modified onto another human, but can cause fatal internal damage to the original owner
infotext.entitydescription.psmprogenoids: Primaris space marines require more surgery, so their progenoids are not the same as normal space marines
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialwatcher: This gland contains strong acids that can shoot around and burn enemies instantly, and since you already have strong acids in your body, no other acids can harm you(Press F to use)
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialseconda: The secondary heart makes the human body stronger and more resilient, recovering from injuries faster than normal
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialossmodu: Ossmodula allow humans to withstand more damage
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialbiscope: increases human muscle strength and density, increases melee damage, melee speed, and movement speed
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialhaemast: The modified blood regenerates quickly, reduces excessive blood loss, and improves blood flow and oxygen supply
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmateriallarrama: Larraman cells quickly form skin tissue to stop bleeding and heal exposed wounds, have some effect on burns, and provide mild trauma resistance
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialcatalep: the existence of catalepseannode not only improves the skill level of human beings, but also improves the learning speed
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialpreomno: Preomnor improves human resistance to toxins
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialomophag: This modification allows you to refine your genes toward perfection, making all treatments more effective and significantly reducing the likelihood of drug addiction
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmultilu: Artificial lung allow you to last longer without oxygen and resist mild toxins
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialocculob: Occulobe make human remote weapon control skills greatly improved, guns in your hands more lethal
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmateriallymanea: The modified ear looks exactly the same as a normal human ear, but is designed to protect against stun and nausea
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialsusanme: Susan membrane allow humans to stay awake after a fatal injury
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmelanoc: The melanochromic's main function is to prevent ultraviolet burns, but it can also provide some protection against radiation in Europa's icy ocean
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialoolitic: Oolitickidney produces a large amount of adrenaline to fight pain and increase speed when needed, and has a slight toxin filtering ability
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialneurogl: The neuroglottis are designed to detect a variety of toxins, but on Europa, nerves at the back of the mouth effectively inhibit the growth of husk parasites there
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmucrano: Mucranoid will provide some protection against water pressure and skin burns
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialblackba: This gland contains strong acids that can shoot around and burn enemies instantly, and since you already have strong acids in your body, no other acids can harm you
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialsinewco: Beefed up muscles make you stronger, and you can even crash into enemies like a chariot, disabling them (press space while running)
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialmagnifi: This modified pituitary gland implanted in the brain can better stimulate the body's muscle density, making it more resilient
infotext.entitydescription.geneticmaterialbelisar: Also known as the Resurrecter, the belisarian furnace can put humans into a state of suspended animation when they take excessive damage, which is said to have saved many primaris space marines from death
infotext.entitydescription.ummk7: Power armor made of ceramic steel, intended for true super soldiers. the average person would be unable to walk or achieve any desired effect
infotext.entitydescription.UMterminator: Power armor that can only be used by the best of the space Marines. The defense is more powerful, but it is slightly bulky
infotext.entitydescription.servicestud: A silver service stud symbolizes 50 years of combat experience, and only tough fighters are eligible for it
infotext.entitydescription.servicestudgold: A golden service stud symbolizes 100 years of combat experience, which only the best fighters are eligible for it
infotext.entitydescription.purityseal: The purity seal is filled with the blessing of the emperor, which will protect the loyal warrior from mental damage and minor physical trauma
infotext.entitydescription.standard: The noble flag of the legion, let no heresy sully it
infotext.entitydescription.lasriflerod: A high-capacity battery to power the lasrifle
infotext.entitydescription.lasriflerodII: Praise the emperor, better batteries can kill more heresies
infotext.entitydescription.laspistolwwbc: Astral Army officers often fight with a sword in one hand and a laser pistol in one hand. Compared with a laser rifle, a laser pistol is more portable
infotext.entitydescription.laspistolrodwwbc: The battery that powers the laser pistol has a slightly smaller capacity than conventional batteries, but it is easier to manufacture
infotext.entitydescription.plasmagun: A heavy but deadly weapon, its overload mode is locked for safety reasons and can only be fired in standard mode. Remember, loyal plasma never overheats!
infotext.entitydescription.plasmagunrod: Containers filled with liquid hydrogen fuel, which is so low in fuel to prevent overheating, can only be fired twice
infotext.entitydescription.plasmagunrodII: A container filled with liquid hydrogen fuel, which has been reduced in volume to prevent overheating, can only be fired four times
infotext.entitydescription.plasmagunrodIII: A container filled with liquid hydrogen fuel, which has been reduced to prevent overheating, can only be fired eight times
infotext.entitydescription.bolter: The bolter is the standard weapon for space marines, and they deliver death to the emperor's enemies
infotext.entitydescription.bolterstraightmagazine: Straight magazines were common because they were easier to carry, but their poor ammunition capacity made them unfit for the heat of battle
infotext.entitydescription.boltermagazine: Bolter magazines provide more ammunition, but they are less common than straight magazines and are allowed to carry less
infotext.entitydescription.bolternormal: The bolster is the standard weapon for space marines, and they deliver death to the emperor's enemies
infotext.entitydescription.bolterstraightmagazine: Straight magazines were common because they were easier to carry, but their poor ammunition capacity made them unfit for the heat of battle
infotext.entitydescription.boltermagazinenormal: Bolter magazines provide more ammunition, but they are less common than straight magazines and are allowed to carry less
infotext.entitydescription.bolterdrumnormal: The drum is rarely used today. The recipe for making it is lost, and only some military posts may still have some in stock
infotext.entitydescription.krieghelmet: Standard krieg death Corps helmet with gas mask
infotext.entitydescription.krieguniform: The standard uniform of the Kriege Death Regiment, which is thick and covers the body, can withstand some radiation damage
infotext.entitydescription.kriegarmor: The breastplate of the Kriegar Death Corps, equipped with the grenadier regiments and officers, is not only excellent in defense, but also a symbol of status
infotext.entitydescription.kriegcommissarcap: The political commissar cap of the Krieg Death Corps, full of majesty, inspires the soldiers around
infotext.entitydescription.commissarcap: The cap of the political commissar of the Imperial guard, full of majesty, inspires the soldiers around
infotext.entitydescription.chainsword: Originally a weapon of techno-barbarians, it will now tear apart the emperor's enemies
infotext.entitydescription.combatknife: Bullets may run out, energy may run out, but the loyal combat knife can always be relied on
infotext.entitydescription.powersword: Each power sword is a magic weapon, not only a status symbol, but also an easy way to kill enemies
infotext.entitydescription.powerhammer: Extremely powerful weapon, only the person implanted with the sinew coils can exert his true power while wearing power armor ———— smash all creatures into a pulp
infotext.entitydescription.chainfist: Fist holsters equipped with miniature chainsaws can also unleash powerful punches when loaded with alien batteries
infotext.entitydescription.stormbolter: storm bolter are more powerful, after all, in the heat of battle, changing a magazine can mean death
infotext.entitydescription.stormboltermagazine: To provide enough firepower for the storm bolter, the magazine is loaded with 50 rounds
infotext.entitydescription.shovel: Kriges often use this lightweight weapon, which can easily tear apart walls and open the heads of their enemies
infotext.entitydescription.40mmradgrenade: It needs to be fired from a grenade launcher, which emits a powerful amount of radiation and explodes in a slightly smaller area than a conventional grenade to avoid injuring the user
infotext.entitydescription.boardingshield: If you want to fend off a barrage of bullets on a pirate ship, boarding shield is the way to go
infotext.entitydescription.autopistol: Autopistols are old weapons, but they still work ———— traitors are always willing to use them
infotext.entitydescription.pistolmagazine: A autopistol magazine usually holds 10 rounds. Primitive, but effective
infotext.entitydescription.handsmg: Someone once made fun of the performance of this weapon before he was beaten to death by it, and I hope it wasn't you
infotext.entitydescription.handsmgmagazine: Mini smg magazines that can dump all the bullets in a fraction of a second
infotext.entitydescription.agripinaa: Loud but damaging enough that no one should underestimate this weapon
infotext.entitydescription.agripinaamagazine: Modified large 40-round magazines for agripinaa rifles
infotext.entitydescription.hammer: It's all spiked, improvised weapons, but still, it's not a good idea to get hit with one of these, is it？
infotext.entitydescription.flamethrower: To the emperor, with flame to purify all
infotext.entitydescription.flamethrowerfueltank: Flamethrower sticky fuel use, can use long time
infotext.entitydescription.handflamethrower: Cabinet durable flame spray gun, used more close self-defense
infotext.entitydescription.handflamethrowerfuelta: This kind of fuel tank after the special craft processing, lighter, easy to carry, But bad capacity to make it not as a primary weapon duty
infotext.entitydescription.heavybolter: The heavy weapons, guns and ammunition used for the attack were cumbersome
infotext.entitydescription.heavyboltermagazine: This ammunition diameter larger, charge more, power is also unusual. Due to too heavy to carry difficult
infotext.entitydescription.assaultcannon: It's a very high rate of fire suppression weapon, most suitable for fighting in small spaces such as hulks and outposts.
infotext.entitydescription.assaultcannonammobox: A ammunition box used to prepare ammunition for the assault cannon used by the Terminator’s power armor, with a capacity of 500 rounds
infotext.entitydescription.automaticinjectionagen: The Space Marines Power Armor has a built-in array of meditators, which will inject this compound potion when the Space Marines' life is dying, and it can deal with almost all kinds of injuries.
infotext.entitydescription.bolterpistol: Bolter pistols have very little bullet capacity and are generally not used in fierce battles. Some mortal officers who are powerful enough will use this weapon
infotext.entitydescription.bolterpistolmagazine: Built-in 8 rounds of regular bolter round, which are powerful enough but limited in number. The biggest advantage is that they are easy to carry.
infotext.entitydescription.sunderarmorgrenade: A grenade used by the human empire, which can provide good structural damage and high damage
infotext.entitydescription.concussiongrenade: Imperial sailors are good at using this grenade. Its explosion can stun and stun the enemy. The most important thing is that its explosion will not damage the hull, so it is often used in boarding and anti-boarding battles.
infotext.entitydescription.boltermagazinenormal_h: A special rounds used to deal with a large group of enemies. After hitting it, it will explode and cause damage like a heavy bolter in the explosive area.
infotext.entitydescription.boltermagazinenormal_a: A special bolterround designed to penetrate power armor
infotext.entitydescription.boltermagazinenormal_i: This is an experimental magazine. The production principle is not known for a long time. After hitting the body, it will form a small deadly vacuum space. Even the Space Marines will suffer a lot of damage.
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgun: Although it is said that the main weapon of armed sailors is the laser rifle, in some special cases, the shotgun is still used for combat.
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell_boa: Widely used in boarding and anti-boarding warfare, it has a small spread, concentrated power and does not damage the hull
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell: Conventional shotgun shell shoot multiple shrapnels in a small area to kill targets, and their damage can even exceed laser guns at close range
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell_rif: Some people think that a rifled slug shotgun shell is not a shotgun shell, but it doesn't matter. It can be fired from a shotgun and hit the target accurately
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell_hel: Similar to the low-profile version of the Hellfire bolter of the Space Marines, fired by a shotgun, it can kill a large number of enemies
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell_fla: Krieg sappers use this flare. They have many uses: provide light, send signals, mark, etc., of course, can also be used to shoot enemies in emergency situations
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell_rad: It is essentially a miniature radiation grenade, modified to be fired by a shotgun
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell_arm: Specially modified shotgun shells, each pellet has a certain armor breaking effect, even the power armor wearing Space Marines will choose to avoid it
infotext.entitydescription.combatshotgunshell_stu: A shotgun shell used to suppress riots. It is a non-lethal weapon
infotext.entitydescription.radiotoxingrenade: contains dangerous radiation poison gas, usually used for special missions-such as capturing enemy ships without destroying the hull
infotext.entitydescription.Medikit: Guardsman's squad equipment can be purchased at every outpost, and a skilled doctor can use a first aid kit to quickly treat a variety of injuries
infotext.entitydescription.license: This license has been around for some years. It is issued by the authority of the empire, which gives the holder the right to private and trade.
infotext.entitydescription.cargometalcrate: In order to ensure that the goods will not be stolen, the empire often uses this kind of box for cargo transportation
infotext.entitydescription.rebeluniform: The usual clothes of traitors, dirty
infotext.entitydescription.rebelmask: A mask commonly used by traitors, cowards are always afraid to show their faces
infotext.entitydescription.hellpistol: Has a more powerful laser pistol, usually issued to senior officers for use
infotext.entitydescription.hellpistolrod: The Hellpistol would have required a heavy battery pack to power it, but the Mechanicus on Europa created an experimental disposable battery that would briefly power the Hellpistol, but not again Recharge, as excessive heat will directly burn the battery
infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostpurif: We have lost contact with [location1]. The rebels have defeated the imperial loyalists here, purifying their sins, ALL KILL.
infotext.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostpurify: We have purified the outpost, and may the loyal soul rest in peace.
infotext.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostpurify: We failed to purify the sins of those rebels.
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostpurify: Praise the emperor, we have purified this place.
infotext.missiondescription.abandonedoutposthusk: [location1], which received a batch of husk eggs for research purposes, has now lost contact with us. We have reason to believe that a biohazard has broken out there, destroy the aliens, soldiers.
infotext.missionsuccess.abandonedoutposthusk: The husk crisis here is lifted
infotext.missionfailure.abandonedoutposthusk: The husk is still active here
infotext.missionmessage0.abandonedoutposthusk: Alien, your fate can only be death!
infotext.afflictiondescription.excessiverecoil: You probably shouldn't try this weapon. Excessive recoil makes you very painful
infotext.afflictioncauseofdeathself.excessivereco: Don't use weapons like this next time
infotext.afflictiondescription.excessiverecoilplu: You probably shouldn't try this weapon. Excessive recoil makes you very painful
infotext.afflictioncauseofdeathself.excessivereco: Don't use weapons like this next time
infotext.afflictiondescription.shreddedarmor: The armor-piercing shrapnel is embedded in your body
infotext.afflictionname.barapace: Power armor function has been launched
infotext.afflictionname.barapaceplus: Terminator power armor function has been launched
infotext.afflictiondescription.eyeball: This gland contains strong acids that can shoot around and burn enemies instantly, and since you already have strong acids in your body, no other acids can harm you
infotext.afflictiondescription.secondaryheart: The secondary heart makes the human body stronger and more resilient, recovering from injuries faster than normal
infotext.afflictiondescription.ossmodula: Ossmodula allow humans to withstand more damage
infotext.afflictiondescription.biscopea: increases human muscle strength and density, increases melee damage, melee speed, and movement speed
infotext.afflictiondescription.haemastamen: The modified blood regenerates quickly, reduces excessive blood loss, and improves blood flow and oxygen supply
infotext.afflictiondescription.larramanorgan: Larraman cells quickly form skin tissue to stop bleeding and heal exposed wounds, have some effect on burns, and provide mild trauma resistance
infotext.afflictiondescription.catalepseannode: the existence of catalepseannode not only improves the skill level of human beings, but also improves the learning speed
infotext.afflictiondescription.preomnor: Preomnor improves human resistance to toxins
infotext.afflictiondescription.omophage: This modification allows you to refine your genes toward perfection, making all treatments more effective and significantly reducing the likelihood of drug addiction
infotext.afflictiondescription.multilung: Artificial lung allow you to last longer without oxygen and resist mild toxins
infotext.afflictiondescription.occulobe: Occulobe make human remote weapon control skills greatly improved, guns in your hands more lethal
infotext.afflictiondescription.lymanear: The modified ear looks exactly the same as a normal human ear, but is designed to protect against stun and nausea
infotext.afflictiondescription.susanmembrane: Susan membrane allow humans to stay awake after a fatal injury
infotext.afflictiondescription.melanochromic: The melanochromic's main function is to prevent ultraviolet burns, but it can also provide some protection against radiation in Europa's icy ocean
infotext.afflictiondescription.oolitickidney: Oolitickidney produces a large amount of adrenaline to fight pain and increase speed when needed, and has a slight toxin filtering ability
infotext.afflictiondescription.neuroglottis: The neuroglottis are designed to detect a variety of toxins, but on Europa, nerves at the back of the mouth effectively inhibit the growth of husk parasites there
infotext.afflictiondescription.mucranoid: Mucranoid will provide some protection against water pressure and skin burns
infotext.afflictiondescription.blackbarapace: This gland contains strong acids that can shoot around and burn enemies instantly, and since you already have strong acids in your body, no other acids can harm you
infotext.afflictiondescription.sinewcoils: Beefed up muscles make you stronger, and you can even crash into enemies like a chariot, disabling them (press space while running)
infotext.afflictiondescription.magnificat: This modified pituitary gland implanted in the brain can better stimulate the body's muscle density, making it more resilient
infotext.afflictiondescription.belisarianfurnace: Also known as the Resurrecter, the belisarian furnace can put humans into a state of suspended animation when they take excessive damage, which is said to have saved many primaris space marines from death
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.c1: An Imperial guard is inspecting the passing crowd. He sees you. "Hey, You! Come here! I understand you came here from another outpost. Do you have a privateers license by the Empire?"
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o1: "Uh, are you talking about privateers license? Of course I have it."
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o1.c1: The guardsman reaches out to you: "Show me your license. This is a routine check."
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o1.o1: Find out if you have a privateers license on your body
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o1.o1.c1: "Ah, honorable rogue trader, I'm sorry to disturb you, you can go now." The guardsman returned the privateer license to you
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o1.o1.c2: "Hey! If you don't have an imperial license, it's not a good thing." The guardsman took out a new privateer license: "Take it, but you Have to pay a fine of 2000 points."
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o2: Maybe you should run away right now
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o2.c1: "Ah! Look at that!" You yelled, pointed in a random direction, then turned around and ran
infotext.eventtext.licensecheck.o2.o1: The guardsman yelled in the crowd and wanted to chase you, but in the end he was failure
infotext.eventtext.drunkenman.c1: A drunken guardsman walks towards you, yelling something as he goes
infotext.eventtext.drunkenman.o1.c1: The guardsman walked up to you with the smell of alcohol and bumped into you. He looked up at you angrily, just about to speak, but suddenly seemed to recognize your identity. "Sorry, sir," he muttered, shoving a packet into your hand: "Don't bring this up to my superiors..."
infotext.eventtext.drunkenman.o1.c2: The guardsman grumbles and shoves you, then suddenly punches you in the face
infotext.eventtext.drunkenman.o2.c1: You mingled with the crowd, and the drunkard's scolding grew farther and farther.
infotext.eventtext.drunkenman.o2.c2: The alcoholic shouted to pull your clothes, you just turned your head and got punched in the face
infotext.eventtext.reinforcement.c1:
You have just entered the outpost's management room when a soldier in the uniform of the Krieg Death Corps approaches you:

"Report to you, sir! I'm from Krieg The 51st Regiment of the Dead Legion, No. 5135-3840, has been ordered to join your ships."
infotext.eventtext.reinforcement.o1.c1: I received orders to escort your submarine all the way to the bottom of the ocean. Captain, request boarding!
infotext.eventtext.reinforcement.o1.o1.c1: The Krieg salutes you and silently enters the submarine
infotext.eventtext.reinforcement.o1.o2: Probably shouldn't have let this Krieg soldier on board, after all, they have a weird temper.
infotext.eventtext.reinforcement.o2: "Sorry, there is no more room on my ship for another warrior. "
infotext.eventtext.reinforcement.o2.c1: The Krieg left without a word
infotext.loadingscreentip: Welcome to use "Astartes' surgery and more WH40K gears" and have fun!
Surgery genes are precious, so make them as pure as possible
Praise the emperor! Praise holly terra!
Without black carapace, power armor is just a decoration
The recoil force of the bolter is very large. If there is no power armor protection, mortals will be injured if they use it
Want to try the high power of bolter, but can't activate the power armor? You can try the bolter pistol!
Plasma weapons are powerful, doors, structures, and human bodies can all be shredded, but it takes a long time to prepare
Help! Can anyone see this tip? I am trapped in the subspace now, so I can only ask for help in this way!
The storm bolter can be used with only one hand, but its excessive recoil makes you have to activate the Terminator power armor to use it normally
The first article of Astarte scripture: If you find error while using this mod, report it to the workshop comment section immediately!
Heavy bolter and assault cannon are so powerful that only Terminator power armor can control them
The boarding shield is very heavy. If you are a mortal, please don't try to pick it up, it is not calibur
Beware of armor-piercing weapons such as powered swords, armor-piercing grenade, etc., they are also deadly for Astartes
The equipment of mortals is also very powerful, please don’t ignore the power of mortals
Article 2 of the Guardsman Infantry Squad Manual: The battery of the laser weapon can be recharged, please charge it in time after the battle
Don’t use the assault cannon for a long time to fire, even the Terminator’s power armor can't completely resist its powerful recoil
If you take received armor-piercing damage and recoil damage, please use the battlefield medikit for treatment
Don't try to steal shipments, the Empire will lock them up
Space Marines' flamethrowers are so hot they can even be used to cut through hatches
If you go down, you'll want to have an automatic injection agent in your power armor
Skilled Imperial Sailors are always well versed in the effects of all kinds of shotgun shells and use them when the time is right
Privateer's license is an ancient authorization that still works today - at least when you're facing annoying guardsman
Krieg's shovel has high structural damage and is a handy weapon
Even if the power is depleted, the power sword is still a sharp weapon
Space Marine power armor can carry two oxygen tanks, and a potion
Flexible choice between live ammunition and laser weapons, both of which have advantages and disadvantages
Standard shine brightly and illuminate the surroundings, useful in dark environments
Some special weapons do not cause damage to the hull, use them first in boarding battles and anti-boarding battles
Some of the abandoned outposts have large numbers of rebels, be careful when clearing them
The best way to deal with a hostile Space Marine is another Space Marine
Courage and Honour! ——— Ultramarines
We March for Macragge! ——— Ultramarines
We shall know no fear! ——— Ultramarines
The foundation of the empire rests on sacrifice, and the blood of the martyrs is the fire of the empire
faith is my shield，fury is my sword
Burn the hereticlib.Kill the mutant.Purge the unclean
Laser weapons cause burns, and ordinary body armor cannot effectively resist this kind of damage
chainsword are powered by fuel rods, and chains themselves are consumables
Powersword is powered by alien batteries and is a powerful melee weapon
Hellpistols are more powerful than regular laser weapons, but due to excessive heat, their batteries will burn out after use and cannot be recharged
